entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a quiet and calm character who is investigating the death. He is described as saying 'I shouldn't think so, no' in response to Mrs Cole's question.

entities.name: billy
entities.description: Billy is mentioned as someone who had argued with Tom Riddle the day before his death.

entities.name: amy benson
entities.description: Amy Benson is mentioned as one of the people who went into a cave with Tom Riddle and experienced something strange afterwards.

entities.name: dennis bishop
entities.description: Dennis Bishop is mentioned as someone who went into a cave with Tom Riddle and experienced something strange afterwards.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as the person who died. He is also described as having argued with Billy the day before his death and as going into a cave with Amy Benson and Dennis Bishop.

entities.name: mrs cole
entities.description: Mrs Cole is mentioned as someone who is investigating the death along with Dumbledore. She is described as taking a swig of gin and slopping some over her chin.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is investigating the death of Tom Riddle.
Billy had argued with Tom Riddle the day before his death.
Amy Benson went into a cave with Tom Riddle and experienced something strange afterwards.
Dennis Bishop went into a cave with Tom Riddle and experienced something strange afterwards.
